"Craft Information":
"About ordering from other players

After finding a player to perform crafts for you with Crafter Search, you can select \"Craft\" from that player's My Room Terminal, which will allow you to place a crafting order with one of that player's characters.

You can cancel orders, or receive the results of a completed order, by selecting \"Craft\"â†’\"Pending\" from any Visiphone.
